title: WATCH:  Large herd of cattle cross through Colorado town
description: A large herd of cattle crossed through a town in Colorado during a six-mile journey to reach their summer grazing grounds.

title: WATCH:  Kitten rescued from car engine on busy highway
description: Police officers helped rescue a kitten trapped in a car engine along a busy highway in Howard County, Maryland, and one official said "I've never been on a call like this."

title: Minnesota condo evacuated over stability concerns
description: More than 140 people were evacuated from a condominium in Minnesota amid concerns that the building was unstable

title: Rain brings much-needed relief to firefighters battling Halifax-area wildfires
description: A wildfire forced thousands of residents from their homes over the past week.

title: Hong Kong detains 8 people on eve of Tiananmen Square anniversary
description: Four of them were arrested for allegedly disrupting order in public spaces.

title: 2 children rescued from vehicle on fire as woman shoplifts: Police
description: A 24-year-old Florida woman is facing criminal charges after she left two children in a car while she was allegedly shoplifting.

title: Twitter executive responsible for content safety resigns after Elon Musk criticism
description: An executive responsible for safety, content moderation is leaving the company.

title: Gadhafi's son goes on hunger strike in Lebanon to protest detention without trial
description: He has been held in Lebanon for more than seven years without a trial.

title: Russia bans 'unfriendly' countries' journalists from showpiece economic gathering
description: Journalists from countries that Russia regards as unfriendly have been banned.

title: Connecticut governor poised to sign state's most sweeping gun measure since post-Sandy Hook laws
description: A slate of gun control measures is headed to Connecticut Gov. Ned Lamont’s desk.

title: Turkey's Erdogan takes oath of office, ushering in his third presidential term
description: Turkey's Erdogan takes oath of office, ushering in his third presidential term

title: Israeli army kills gunman in shootout along Egypt's border
description: Israeli military says troops shot and killed a gunman in a shootout in southern Israel along the Egyptian border

title: As anti-gay sentiment grows, more LGBTQ+ people seek to flee Uganda
description: Frightened LGBTQ+ Ugandans are searching for a way to escape a new law prescribing the death penalty for ‘aggravated homosexuality

title: Hawaii allows more concealed carry after US Supreme Court ruling, but bans guns in most places
description: Hawaii Gov. Josh Green has signed legislation that will allow more people to carry concealed firearms

title: Houseboats catch fire at popular destination Lake Powell on Utah-Arizona line
description: More than half a dozen house boats momentarily caught fire at a popular boating destination on the Utah-Arizona line on Friday

title: Washington man climbing Mount Rainier dies near summit
description: Officials say a Washington state man who was trying to summit Mount Rainier collapsed and died near the top of the mountain in the national park

title: Lawsuit alleging ex-deputy falsified arrest report settled for $250K
description: A lawsuit filed by an oyster farmer accusing a now-decertified county deputy of falsifying an arrest report and urging a person to lie during a domestic-violence investigation has been settled for $250,000

title: Mexico arrests 2nd migrant in detention center fire that killed 40
description: Two federal officials say Mexican authorities have arrested a second migrant for his alleged involvement in a March fire set inside a border detention center that left 40 migrants dead and dozens injured

title: West Virginia state trooper shot and killed, armed suspect at large: Police
description: Sgt. Cory Maynard was fatally wounded, according to West Virginia Gov. Jim Justice.

title: WATCH:  Teen reacts to learning he won a full-ride college scholarship
description: Amir Staten is on his way to Morehouse College as a Bonner Scholar!
